pages.text: What is the matter with you? How judge you
Will you not then receive advice
Or have you an authority manifest
Then bring your book if you are truthful
And they have created a blood relationship between Him and the jinn. But the jinn know that they have indeed to appear
Glory be to God, He is free from the things they ascribe to Him
Not so the servants of God, sincere and devoted
Indeed neither you nor those you worship
Can lead any into temptation concerning God
Except those whom are themselves heading to the blazing fire
“Not us, only for him is a place known
“And indeed we are arranged in ranks
“And we are indeed those who declare God's glory.”
And there were those who said
“If only we had before us a message from those in the past
“We would certainly have been servants of God, sincere.”
So they reject it, but soon will they know
Our word has already been passed on before to Our servants sent by Us
So that they would certainly be assisted
And that Our forces surely must conquer
So turn away from them for a little while
And watch them, and they soon will see
Do they wish to rush our punishment
But when it descends into the open space before them, terrible will be the morning for those who were warned
So turn away from them for a little while
And watch and they soon will see
Glory to your Lord, the Lord of Honor and Power, free from what they ascribe to Him
And peace on the messengers
And praise God, the Guardian Evolver of all the worlds
